description: Try our easy to follow Donut S'mores recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Donut S'mores Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill to medium. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place 1/4 cup hazelnut spread and cream in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until smooth. Chill.

Meanwhile, cut donuts in half through the middle. Lay cut side up on tray. Flatten marshmallows slightly by squashing between your palms. Place 5 marshmallows each onto 4 of the donut halves. Spread each of the other donut halves with remaining hazelnut spread.

Place donuts on tray and grill, watching closely, for 1 minute or until the marshmallows are golden and softened. Sandwich donut halves together. Place a flattened marshmallow on top of each and grill for a few seconds. Drizzle with hazelnut cream sauce and serve while still warm.
